a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Plastic waste accumulated in the oceans, 2000 to 2019
The amount of plastic waste that has accumulated in the oceans since 1951. This is calculated as the running
total of plastic flowing into the ocean each year.
Note: Regional definitions adhere to those specified by the OECD.
